<NEW>

Lord Elder watched a=
s Legacy walked away and Tuscon and Talon began
talking. He sighed again an=
d began walking to where the others were.
He could hear thier conversation.=


"Are you really counting?" Lord Elder and Quickstride a curious look
on h=
is face. His face and form looked a little bigger than before, his
face cle=
ar and shiny, and yet he still managed to have a haggered look
on his face.=


"While you are counting, don't forget while everyone else was off
fightin=
g in the battle when Cyclonus and his drones were sacking
everyone includin=
g the Predacons that Legacy single handedly held the
Ark against 5 of Cyclo=
nus' most powerful cronies. When we had to go
rescue Rodimus who was there =
helping, taking much of the damage and
expending his precious energon to sh=
ield you guys. That was Legacy."

Lord Elder frowned, "Has anyone ever even=
 talked with legacy? Does
anyone even know the first thing about him? He ar=
rived here from
Primus knows where and no one even asked him anything. You =
trust him
when the energon chips are down, but now you are ready to boot hi=
m
out."

"What are we Maximals or rabble. If we turn to fighting among
ours=
elves then what are we?" Lord Elder shook his head as he began to
walk away=
. "And before you go betting on who would win the battle you
were discussin=
g, you might want to find out more about Legacy first."
